author: lehors
msg: avoid using ANT_HOME which can be used with a different value
than what we need. - patch from Lynn Monson

author: lehors
msg: nextNode failed to stop at the boundary of the subtree being iterated over,
it would go to the next sibling of the root node.

author: jeffreyr
msg: A declared default ID attribute must be of type #IMPLIED or #REQUIRED

author: lehors
msg: I thought it would be worth the effort to rewrite the traversal code in
ranges.  The (old) code has several bugs, has duplicated code, and can be
hard to read.  I've rewritten the code to address these problems and my
patch is attached.  FWIW... I also have a set of several hundred traversal
test cases that I've run the new patch through.

author: jeffreyr
msg: get rid of class files in zip
